actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.
Reported jointly to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations with amendment, S. Rept. 95-1245.
Reported jointly to Senate from the Committee on Human Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 95-1245.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 12509 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to amend the Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1975 to provide for assistance to new refugees and for other purposes.
short_title: Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Amendments

summary.text: (Reported jointly to Senate from the Committees on Foreign Relations and Human Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 95-1245) Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Amendments - Amends the Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1975 to: (1) establish September 30, 1982, as the termination date of the Act; (2) provide 100 percent Federal funding for assistance to refugees, but limit it to three years from the date of entry; (3) exempt unaccompanied minors from the three year limit; and (4) authorize the appropriation of $30,000,000 for the resettlement, training, and education of refugees.

titles.title: Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Amendments
A bill to amend the Indochina Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1975 to provide for assistance to new refugees and for other purposes.
